Functions
GalaxyStats

Output to stdout and lua console statictics in the given cube. Start the game before using!

using:

GalaxyStats(centerX, centerY, centerZ, radius of cube, processors)

example using from console:

require 'Dev'.GalaxyStats(0,0,0,5, "CountSystemNames CountSystems CountPopulation")
Parameters
centerX, centerY, centerZ

integer, coordinates of center of the cube, 0, 0, 0 = Sol

radius

integer - distance in sectors from center to edge of the cube

processors

string - Processor names separated by spaces available processor names: CountSystems CountSystemNames CountPopulation PlanetsGravity

Availability

2020

Status

experimental
